result.title: Task of ACM team leader
result.content:
Hello guys,

This is my first blog post and it's going to be a set of questions. ACM regional is getting closer and my friends and I are having an argument as to who must lead the team. We are turning to you, experienced coders and former ACMers, to give us advice.

  • What does a team leader do and how to elect one?
  • What are collaboration strategies?
